    • Method Detail

      • act

        public Types.ACTIONS act(SerializableStateObservation stateObs,
                         ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)

      • act

        public Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservation so,
                         ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or action NIL will be applied.
        Specified by:
        act in class Player
        Parameters:
        so - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • init

        public boolean init(StateObservation so,
                    boolean isValidation)
        Parameters:
        so - State observation of the current game in its initial state
        isValidation - true if the level to play is a validation one.
        Returns:
        true if Init worked.

      • act

        public Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservationMulti stateObs,
                         ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Description copied from class: Player
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or no action will be applied. Multi player method.
        Specified by:
        act in class Player
        Parameters:
        stateObs - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • result

        public int result(StateObservation stateObs)
        Function called when the game is over. This method must finish before CompetitionParameters.TEAR_DOWN_TIME, or the agent will be DISQUALIFIED
        Parameters:
        stateObs - the game state at the end of the game

      • startPlayerCommunication

        public boolean startPlayerCommunication()
        Starts the communication between the server and the client.
        Returns:
        true or false, depending on whether the initialization has been successful

      • finishPlayerCommunication

        public boolean finishPlayerCommunication()
        Tells the client that this is over. Se finito.
